dcterms:description: The R4RA clinical trial dataset includes Whole Slide Images (WSIs) from 164 patients with rheumatoid arthritis, who underwent ultrasound-guided synovial biopsy. The samples were stained with Hematoxylin & Eosin (H&E) and Immunochemistry (IHC) stains, providing information on tissue architecture and specific immune cells. The dataset consists of 651 WSIs with varying numbers of images per patient, and labels are assigned at the patient level.
dcterms:title: R4RA clinical trial dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Y. Lu
D. F. K. Williamson
T. Y. Chen
dcterms:description: The CLAM model dataset is used for benchmarking weakly supervised computational pathology on whole-slide images. It provides a data-efficient framework for analyzing histopathology images, focusing on the performance of attention-based models.
dcterms:title: CLAM model dataset (used for benchmarking)
